website_summaries.verdict: Offers the perfect balance: high-quality photos that can also be stickers.
pros: It’s small, easy to use, and produces incredible photographs
4 color choices for the body of this printer
2" x 3" prints are vivid and resist wear and tear, water, and do not smudge
Very compact, so can be taken anywhere
cons: It can only print 25 photos on a single battery charge
Some reported it working well when new, with print quality diminishing over time

customer_reviews.title: Pink haze on all pictures
customer_reviews.text: This printer does not work like advertised. I can’t beilve the reviews. EVERY picture has a pink haze where there should be white. Tried different phones and different pictures. Nothing changed. Tech support said try to lighten the picture before you print. Yeh that just made the picture more pink. It will not take clear crisp pictures so in return you get tiny pics with lots of pink backgrounds. Another Christmas present down the tubes. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: MAM 8670

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt print well or fast
customer_reviews.text: We trust polaroid to deliver instant photos but this is not that. This is a minute or even two between photos when working. Most the time it is jammed or overheated we only got about 10 pictures through this thing in about an hours time not good when you are trying to deliver photo booth pictures. And the quality you expect it to be okay throughout we found that each print went down in quality until we have up near the end with very blue pictures. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work when app fails.
customer_reviews.text: It was great till the app stopped seeing the zip printer. I tried contacting the app customer service, to no avail. Polaroid people just walked me through same trouble shooting recipes that I already tried multiple times. They said it was past warrantee and just buy another. The printer is barely a year old.
customer_reviews.author: VanityFair

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this tiny portable printer. The ink is reasonably priced. The photos are good quality that can be made better by adjusting the photo on your phone first, not on the App. They tend to be on the dark side but that’s easily corrected by lightening the photo. Easy to set up and just a minute to print. Sometimes the Zip App is slow but you just have to give it a little while or try again. That’s an App issue not a printer issue. This printer is so much fun! Like a new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Conner

customer_reviews.title: It's better to spend a couple more dollars to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. It's better to spend a couple more dollars to get the Sprocket than this useless device. I got this around October last year and it worked fine but now the app that allows you to connect and send the print commands to the actual printer doesn't work. It's really disappointing that they haven't don't anything to fix it either so save yourself the frustration and just purchase the sprocket it uses the same printing paper so you won't be losing money there. Do NOT buy this item if I could give it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chong

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly cannot connect to iPhone and iPad
customer_reviews.text: The photo quority wasn't good but I was satisfied the product because I had just used it for the recording my life. However,,, I wanted to use it for the first time in over six months. I tried to connect it to iPhone and iPad by Bluetooth. But the Bluetooth doesn't work suddenly. Manufacture said the printer has something wrong so it should be replaced... But it has already 1year passed when I purchased it. So I have to buy it again... So I cannot use the printer more... I have still more 60 sheets of zink paper... I cannot trust this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pen and Ink

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost never review stuff but I bought the for Christmas and have had nothing but trouble. Pictures come out black not dark but black to the point you can't even see are faces in the picture. About 1 out of 10 prints OK ish. He app is just horrible there no other way to describe it. I have Recalibrated it like 10 times bought new paper even tried HP paper they all come out really dark and poor quality if you use the app to brighten the pictures or change the filter or anything it comes out washed and grainy just utterly bad. Oh I tried 3 different phones too HTC, and two different iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of being able to print your own small pictures but it really is a hit or miss. I know I couldn’t be too critical after all it’s printing them pretty small but sometimes they come out too dark and when you go to adjust the brightness to fix the picture it pixilated the whole thing. I wasted probably 4 prints just trying to see if I could get it to do what it’s suppose to. I don’t see the point in the color adjustment in the app if it screws up your pictures worse.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vega

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher, and bought this with intent to sell photo booth pictures at a school dance. The printer worked easily, and the blue-tooth worked great. I was about 15 feet from the printer and it worked just fine. After about an hour of persistent use, it needed recharging. Luckily, you can charge and still print photos at the same time. The pictures are small- the size of an ID or credit card. I had no problems with lighting, and that is even with the lights turned down for the dance. Overall, they made perfect little keepsakes. I also liked that the film for this wireless printer was .50/print, making it more affordable than larger printers.
customer_reviews.author: eatsleepteach

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 13 yr old grandson. He loves it! He set it up in under a minute and was taking pics of the family with his phone and printing them off. He has budgeted the new expense of film into his snow shovelling/lawn mowing income. Of course, I will work with the young entrepreneur when he needs side jobs :). And gifts of film because he's a good kid. But seriously, we all loved this little printer and a couple of us will probably acquire them before next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Junk.  $100 paperweight.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, I saw the bad ones and thought, "this won't happen to me!" The printer worked for a week. I was able to print out 10 pictures. Now it won't connect to my phone. I have emailed tech support and they sent back very generic directions. "Uninstall/install the app. Reset the device. Try reconnecting with your Bluetooth." Thanks, I tried all of that before I contacted you. I am so disappointed. Please save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Too much editing- turns out dark
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this but when I printed my first I thought it was just me. Tried again and realized that each photo had to be edited because they come out with a sepia type filter so I have to adjust all photos to make them lighter and brighter in order to get the right look. I waste about 3-4 films for 1 perfect one. And event then I can’t save the perfect one to reprint. You have to know how many to print already or you’ll end up editing each one. It takes the fun out of the whole thing in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Carioca

customer_reviews.title: Terrible print quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this thing printed much better quality photos. I knew they would not be as bright as the image on the phone obviously, but everything about the print was awful- super red “sunburn” skin colors, dark dull image, colors were completely off even with editing and brightening. Mini prints on sticker paper are a lovely idea, but Polaroid made an awful execution.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Must have printer for Globe Trotters.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have tool for those going to shoot tribal portraits in 3rd World countries. Normally, people don't like their picture taken by tourists, but in places where cameras are rare, and folks don't have family portraits, you will have the whole village coming to get their picture taken. The device is much better than previous generations. The photos have good color and reasonable snap shot size. The bluetooth connection with phone is easy. So, all you need is your iPhone with this device in your pocket and you are ready for Africa or Latin America.
customer_reviews.author: Atufft

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this little printer. I got it to add picture to mine and my granddaughters planner I purchased for her. We both had fun adding pictures of the fun things we did when she stayed a week with us. Yes, the pictures do tend to be dark if you don't brighten them before printing them out. Love that you can peel off the back of the photo and stick it wherever you want. My granddaughter liked it so much that she has put it on her Christmas list. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Dever

customer_reviews.title: Fun Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and compact photo printer. I love that the prints look like the old polaroid photos ( grainy, moody, and vintage looking). I was able to link it to my phone very easily and it prints in no time. There are different filters, fun symbols and borders you can add to your image before you print as well. An extra bonus is that you can also shoot and print as well ( it acts like a camera). Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New app is TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: BEFORE YOU PURCHASE GO LOOK AT THE REVIEWS FOR THE App!!! I have had this printer a few years now and I've been really happy with it. However they got a new app and it's horrible. Hard to use - LESS features than before and it wants location permissions to use (shady). I went back to the store and saw tons of people with the same issues. I feel lucky that I have the old app on my old phone or my printer would be useless. That being said the actual printer I still love. I do lighten photos because they come out dark otherwise but I don't mind that.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Great travel buddy
customer_reviews.text: This device is freaking cool! It's way better to take my pictures on my phone. Modify them and then print them on the zip than to waste shot after shot with a polaroid instant cam. The app is ok, does what it is intended for. I just wish i could send from my PC. Other than that? It is worth it! I give it a 5.9 on the quality of film. I did noticed the off colors but if u take a good contrast picture it will look way better. This technology in bigger paper would be badass!
customer_reviews.author: Jezrael

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever you don't need ink. The ink is already in the pictures. It's a lot of fun. And cool the show off at get togethers. The pictures peel off on the back and stick to anything. The only thing is make sure the pictures are in good lighting. If you take pictures that are in dark areas they come out with lines or streaks. Easy to order more blank pictures off Amazon any time you need. I bought this for a gift to my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it everybody thinks it's the coolest thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: UncleMatt

customer_reviews.title: Paper jams / short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it needs to be charged for an excessive amount of time every time we want to use it. As of right now it’s been on the charger for 20 minutes and still won’t power on. Also, after printing about 20 photos we ran into a paper jam. An issue that’s still not resolved as the screws they used are too small for even the smallest of mini screwdrivers (including an eye glasses screwdriver). Hoping to get it working again but it won’t even power on so I’m losing hope. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little printer. I found it as a fill in gift for my 9 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it and take pictures of her friends with it. My only 2 complaints is the battery life is short. It's not a deal-breaker but beware when you buy it. Also, the film is pricey. It too is not a deal- breaker but you have to be willing to fork out some money for the film refills. I still give it 5 stars but just wanted to point out some drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little printer.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to get this after reading the reviews..HOWEVER, I had no problems downloading the app (though, I didn't use the one pictured in instructions, I used the other from the app store, also for the zip). It pulled up my pictures without a problem, I went thru and used some of the filters and borders. Yes, the pictures are not crystal clear, they're what you'd expect from a polaroid. Recognizable photos, but not high quality. For kids to use, and just for "fun" it's a good little item. I like the sticky back photo paper, they're cute for kids rooms, college dorms, etc. My only beef with this .. price. It really should be more of a $50 printer....
customer_reviews.author: MrsMO

customer_reviews.title: Immediately returned
customer_reviews.text: I hated this...returned it very quickly. The print quality is terrible...all of my pictures, which were very vibrant, had a yellowish or reddish tint. I contacted Polaroid only to find out they aren’t even the ones that make this printer...another company pays to use the branding. Very disappointing. Swapped it for a Kodak printer I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Roland

customer_reviews.title: Battery died after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Zip printer 3 years ago, I used it a few times a year. This Christmas the printer battery died. I contact customer polaroid service, they said after a year, there is nothing they could do. And the battery is not replaceable! Which means there is no way I could fix it!I bought it for $130 three years ago, and I guess this is how long Polaroid product will last! I emailed Polaroid customer service multiple times for the past 6 months, and they never get back to me even once.! This is the first Polaroid product I bought and I don't think I will ever purchase another Polaroid product again!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great for Journals
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little toy. The pictures are a little dark but good quality. I lighten my photos a bit lighter before printing to compensate for the darkness. It’s great for taking pics for journals and snapshots at parties. For me though it did get old fairly fast. I try to keep it charged and it’s small enough to keep it my back pack. So there have been times I’ve been glad to have it on me. I’ve had fun with it. I recommend ordering a set of photo paper when buying the printer. The paper can go fairly quick once you start having fun with the new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlz Papovitch

customer_reviews.title: Firmware Requirement Broken...Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I would love if I could comment on the photo quality or how the product works, but I couldn't get that far! After downloading the application and getting ready to print, there is a notification for a mandatory firmware update before printing. That's inconvenient, but okay. After waiting hours for this update to finish, I contacted customer service who let me know that there is an issue with the application. They are working on it, but it may take weeks to complete. Not sure why you would sell a product with mandatory firmware updates that you can't even do. AND make it necessary for the functionality of the device. Sending back and finding a printer with reliable tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to print pics from my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Used this to take pics at my aunt's 90th birthday! Very easy to print pics from my iPhone. Best pictures are in bright sunshine or well lit rooms. Michael's just happened to have a little album with the perfect fit windows to slide the pictures into. No waiting for pictures to develop like the old Polaroid cameras. Love this! Bought 50 pack film on sale. So easy to insert into the ZIP printer. The great thing is that I still have the original pictures on my phone if I want to reprint or use in a different way.
customer_reviews.author: amjo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to pair with phone, Print quality is okay
customer_reviews.text: This item was very easy to pair with the app and overall very easy to use, the only thing that bothered me would be the print quality it isn’t the best quality and is a little blurry I expected a little better from the prints.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Tam

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but only works about 1/4 of the time
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but only works about 1/4 of the time. App was easy, set-up was easy but when we get to the final all-important print moment, the app sends the photo to the printer and....it only prints about 1 in every 4 or 5 times. The first two printed great, then it was downhill. I replaced the entire paper set, rebooted and again the first one printed but then...nada. Haven't given up on it completely but frustrating and lacks key functionality.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Unfixable jam after 10 prints. Poor quality prints.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to print 10 photos and then experienced a printer jam. Despite going through all of the trouble shooting, removing the jammed paper, resetting the device, putting in a new pack of paper etc, nothing will solve the printer jam. I tried to remove the TINY screws to open up the device and figure out what the problem is, but two of the four screws are stripped and cannot be removed. I now own an overly expensive paperweight. I would be more upset if the photos were better quality, but they are far inferior to anything I hcan hvae printed in any other way. The photos come out looking lifeless despite being wonderful quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Meagen G.

customer_reviews.title: $130, Broke before finishing first pack of paper - I'm a photographer
customer_reviews.text: Paper jammed (their paper, which came with the kit). We researched how to deal with it, did what we could. No joy. I tried fixing it myself, as I've fixed larger, more complex printers for my work. No joy. Though we got the paper unnamed, the printer would never again get a sheet through the pressure rollers. Big waste of money. We will buy the Fuji competitor, as we have had no problems with their similar Instax product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre printer
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth connection is tricky to pair with my Android phone. It takes me several tries (which ends up being upwards of 15-20min.) just to pair the printer with my phone, so I have to feel really committed to the project to whip it out. The print quality is also not the best. Photos come out looking a bit blotchy and granulated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chang

customer_reviews.title: Weird line on prints ? Returning this one.
customer_reviews.text: So to get right to it, i got 2 paper jams the second and third time I went to print. Thats the 2 white prints with the blue line on them. One after another. On the ones that Did print i got this weird line that you can clearly see. Lool at my attached photos. Its at the top in both photos just above our heads lol but im likely to send this printer back for another one. Am i the only one getting this bizarre line of demarcation? ( on the paper not my hair lmao haha )
customer_reviews.author: Staci silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portability, lack luster printability
customer_reviews.text: There's no need to talk about the portability since we all know it's great here. The printability however, suffered. I've calibrated and tried all the ways but the colors can't compare or even come close to the cartridge based photo prints. i wasn't expecting it to be the same quality but I was disappointed at how dark/dull and off the colors are even we used the blue paper to calibrate and other options I could find online. We've wasted many papers doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Bad software cripples it 90%
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of like an old Polaroid camera. It's totally cool for what it does. The printer itself is pretty good. The software is horrible. You can't edit/crop/rotate, etc. You understand. As far as your print goes--you get what you get. Hopefully your subject matter was centered, because it may be cropped out. The software has this capability, but it doesn't work. Some idiot at Polaroid and his department manager should be fired for ruining this experience and not having it fixed by now. I would not buy it until the software is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Mac

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. This is my second one. Loved the first one, it was great. This one stopped working after 3 months, tried the reset, changing paper, Uninstalling the app, sending pics through Bluetooth and not the app, nothing worked. called polaroid support and they said there is an issue with it and they are working on but don't have any idea when it will be resolved. Asked about getting a replacement, they can't do anything about it. Terrible customer service !! Printer is worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money with weak app and no updates
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago. It worked fine for a few months but then the app update took away a few key features which was annoying but also now my phone no longer connects via Bluetooth and the printer is essentially useless!! There is no tech support and even with very poor ratings the app has not been fixed for months. A complete waste of money!! I will now be buying a different portable printer but feel very frustrated by the wasted time and money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: adozenrosebuds

customer_reviews.title: works Great for 100 or so then starts lacking quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a crafty clever device it prints 100 or so stickers perfect quality then they start having white lines though them not like it low on ink like. It’s just programmed to only work so well so long I’ve had a few of them diff kinds throst was the best but now it’s usess the image of the girl is not supposed to have the weak spots of ink it’s. A hd pic but it has unsteady printing and white steaks :(
customer_reviews.author: BAwpy

customer_reviews.title: polaroid mint is superior this is a waste of time with low quality prints
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the mint to see the difference. This printer has some stupid loading tray inside that is ridiculous and causes errors. Reviews online say that this product and the polaroid mint are the same except this one doesnt print as many photos per charge. Though that may be the case, this printer never successfully printed I spent over 2 hours wheresa with the mint, I downloaded the app and printed away. HORRIBLE product, and no it is not similar, the mint is an upgrade compred to this piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and product specs before buying and you'll be happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun novelty printer. The photo quality is OK once you realize you aren't going to be submitting your 2x3 photos for judgment at any photography competitions. I personally bought mine before traveling to Cuba in 2016 and used it to print "instant" photos of kids and other subjects I met as a "thank you". Kids in particular have never seen instant photos so its like magic. I've been back several times since and it's still magic. One tip: the printer does print darker than the photo appears on screen at full screen brightness. Bump up the photo brightness about 10 to 15% in the app before printing and you'll be golden.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher St Peter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Better now after most recent update. Even worse now... I wish they'd put it back how it was last May in 2016. Now all you can do is print a picture. You cannot edit in any way as there is a circle spinning. I don't understand WHY THEY haven't brought it back to how it was. So many people have complained. If I could go back, my daughter and I would have gotten something else. UPDATE: Better after August 3rd update.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Deines

customer_reviews.title: Fun portable photo printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the next best thing to a Polaroid camera! I was worried about the printable space being too small but it ended up working well for a little scrapbook album. The sticky backing on the photo is a good feature because it means you can put them anywhere! Color calibration has to be done after each pack (10 photos) and after the 7th or 8th print it starts to get a little dark. This can be corrected by keeping the calibration card and doing it more often. Otherwise, it's awesome little photo printer and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: @TANDA.Trips

customer_reviews.title: Product and Seller review
customer_reviews.text: About the product: + i love the portability and ease of use. - the app listed in the manual does not exist in the app store. Had to download another app called Polaroid Zip, at least the manual should update itself or the product is not original or i got a real old stock. About the seller: i think i received a used box, it was not sealed, there was no plastic film on the product. Took away 3 stars due to the package condition It is a novelty item, so don’t expect great prints.
customer_reviews.author: sasi

customer_reviews.title: Not. Worth. It.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my printer for about two months. The one positive I'll give it - I like that it's a sticker. Here's everything that's wrong with it. - The photos come out *terrible* - The connectivity to the printer is shaky at best - The app is confusing and glitches constantly - The battery life is abysmal - It never works the first time Honestly, don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Prial

customer_reviews.title: Cool you.
customer_reviews.text: This is zink technology cool but.... Kodak pigment prints are night and day compared to this...
customer_reviews.author: Blake H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase! Actually my husband bought this for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase! Actually my husband bought this for me as a gift, I was dropping major hints and finally it stuck. The no ink technology is amazing. This portable printer is so portable and can easy travel. Having the ability to print your pictures wherever you go has changed my craft world! As a scrapbooker and planner nerd I like to add pictures to document things. These 2x3 prints are the perfect size. I use apps to create collages or different size pictures. The quality is decent for a no ink printer. Very lightweight and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaChief

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this printer a lot. Like other reviewers, initially when I printed my first photos, I was shocked at how dark they printed. I attempted adjusting the photo on my phone and I couldn’t get it right. But I finally found a solution that works every time: Adjust the brightness on your phone. I printed a photo and adjusted the brightness on my phone so my screen looked identical to the photo. Then I adjusted the photo in the app and got the photos I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: EFishers

customer_reviews.title: ALong - Fix Printer Connection Problem
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Polaroid zink printer today. I installed the app and connected via Bluetooth. Printed 1 print. Worked great. My phone (Android - Galaxy Note 5) told me I had to update. I updated. Tried to print again. Printer did not connect/print. Showed up in Bluetooth list, but did not connect. FIX: I uninstalled the app. Reinstalled the app. Deleted the printer from the blue tooth list. Told Bluetooth to search again for available devices. Reconnected printer. Tried to print again. Worked great. Decent quality for a lil printer. It's very handy for me to print screenshot notes to stick in my journal.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Stone

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Had this for several years. Was very happy with it initially. But now it only works (sometimes). The app that goes with the printer can be troublesome and sometimes pictures don't print correctly anymore which is an issue because the paper is expensive. Charging it is also an issue at this point. Picture on the printer was printed by the printer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable printer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing! This printer is amazing and the app only helps. For those with questions this product enables you to take pictures on your phone with the app (Or you can use a previously taken picture), edit, add text and filters, borders, etc., and then print it via blutetooth within a minute. The printer works amazingly well and doesn't ever require ink- just paper refills. The main benefit I see is that the printed picture has a sticky back so you can use these to print pictures, labels, etc. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with a teenage daughter- she has used this a dozen times already to print pictures for her binders!
customer_reviews.author: Brandifaith

customer_reviews.title: Totally a disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a full research between Instax and Polaroid before buying this printer. Since I wanted to use the pictures on my scrapbook, it seemed super useful having a printer that prints photo stickers. But the pictures quality is terrible, I can barely see people’s faces in the pictures. Just blurry! If you are wondering between this Polaroid zip and the Instax one, just don’t buy this one! My friend has an Instax printer which pictures color and resolution are way better! That’s my experience!
customer_reviews.author: Lanna Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, bought it for my 10yr old for her birthday and she loves it! It is a little bulky but the carrying case makes it easy to transport and use. I did have to reset it one time because the pictures were coming out blank. But that fixed the problem and it works great! Clear pictures and you can edit them and add stuff to them which my daughter loves.
customer_reviews.author: Somer Zvolensky

customer_reviews.title: Fair Quality, Wrong Colors
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality of the pictures, 3.5 stars, (some minor editing prior to printing helps the pics from printing too dark). Portability and accessories, 5 stars The fact they sent me the wrong colors, 0 stars! Everything was thrown together like spare parts. It was supposed to be the red bundle, but it was a red printer, blue case and black photo album.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working for no reason!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. I have been able to print out 8 pictures total. I have it charged, paper in, connected, sends photo to printer, it says it's printing, but then I get a DATA ERROR every single time. I have done whatever trouble shooting there is to do, but nothing helps. What an expensive piece of junk this is. I purchased one for my daughter, and her's works perfectly. I hate that this printer is one of THOSE things that go on my Regret I Bought It list. I'm looking for something different now.
customer_reviews.author: Zippity57

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mini printer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing! It’s small and compact, about the size of a cell phone. The quality isn’t AMAZING but only because the prints are small. I am so glad I bought this and use it for journaling. It’s easy to hook to your phone and the app is easy as well and offers different editing options and filters. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Low cost tool to get you an image
customer_reviews.text: Either this technology hasn't matured yet or Polaroid is not too serious. What do i mean? Print quality kinda sucks unless your a teen or at a party thats not too particular. Battery life needs help. Gimmicky sticker prints not too sharp. As bad as that all sounds, guess what? It's still a great buy! Hahaha! I use this to print photos from my phone in order to use in my shot list for short films. I imagine anyone could use one of these when planning and execution are critical and you need to have physical reference images.
customer_reviews.author: D. GriffinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer! I use it quite a lot. As teacher, I use this a lot to take photos of my students work! and the app is easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepysnails

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this Polaroid product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer as a way to physically share photos while traveling. I worked wonderfully for about 15 prints after which anytime I tried to print the paper would just get stuck. I was forced to disassemble the printer to get it out. After disassembly, I tried to reprint the paper continued to get logged. This printer was extremely easy to use and the print quality was subpar but what I expected from a small pocket printer. I don't know the conditions that Polaroid intended this printer for but clearly living in a padded camera bag on mild travels was too much for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a charging cable with it, so now I’m talking to customer service about it. I did buy the warranty for it. Looks like Amazon cannot send me the missing part, and says I need to contact Zink. And I read other comments about this camera comes with extra cases. Mine did not. It did come with a pack of 10 papers for printing. And I had to buy extra packs. The images come out dark, so you have to lighten it up in editing before printing. But I really do like this, and it’s well worth the money. Really wish the packs of paper didn’t cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Smaller images than photo booth prints!
customer_reviews.text: Cool gadget for simple pictures. Would not recommend this for pleasure use. Photos are too tiny to be appreciated. I use this for image captures on quick data displays. Not recommended for scrapbooking. Young, healthy eyes recommended for observing these prints.
customer_reviews.author: MommyInCandyLand

customer_reviews.title: Supper disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this printer I was very excited. As soon I open and try printer the pictures it did not let me. There was always something wrong in how to put the pictures and to the point that said “OPEN DOOR” when the door wasn’t open. I tried everything and still doesn’t work. Super disappointed because I was looking forward for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The paper curls fairly easily (on its own)... much like old printed photos used to. The color is alright, the photos have almost the same quality as the older camera phones. This is good enough for my purposes. They’re also small, as indicated by the measurements provided in the description. Like, smaller than a playing card. I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: The software push was crap. We called support they said it was the ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this gets TWO stars is the printer worked well before the software UPDATE that really screwed up the format on the prints. Don't get this printer. The software push was crap. We called support they said it was the wait for the next patch. That was a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fun novelty
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget! I got it to use at my daughter's birthday party "photo booth". I took all the pictures on my phone, then printed off pictures for each friend and included in their thank you cards. The color is not the highest quality, but they were good enough for a crowd of 10 year olds. They all loved receiving them! If you're looking for professional quality prints, this isn't for you. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to print out little photos for my daughters baby book. I liked the size of the pictures and the fact that they came on sticky paper. Other than that, this has got to be the worst device ever made. Mine takes FOREVER to print anything and it constantly powers down if you don't use it within a 2 minutes. It keeps disconnecting from my phone somehow (even though it's sitting right next to it) and the colors come out extremely dark and just "off". I should've known not to purchase this because of the horrible reviews. Currently looking for a new photo printer. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lil printer! Do you editing outside of the app. Sometimes I have sync issues but it’s easily solved by restarting the app. Small enough to take anywhere and pics are small enough to fit just about anywhere as well. It’s made a great addition to my journals and sketchbooks.
customer_reviews.author: raquel adams

customer_reviews.title: I want a refund!
customer_reviews.text: I will be requesting a refund. Bought this for my birthday with gift cards I got from friends and family. Wanted this for so long and was so excited! Printed 2 pics and now it won't work. This device requires an app to use it and I wish I had read the app reviews before purchasing because EVERYONE says the same thing. Their phone shows they are connected via Bluetooth but the app says they aren't and therefore it will not print. What a major waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money and Time
customer_reviews.text: I was able to connect the printer to my phone via Bluetooth but the app could never find the printer. I called the manufacturer and they told me to email them for assistance, more than a week later I still didn't have a response. I appreciate the seller providing a refund so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! I can go anywhere and have cool pics printed without worrying about cartridges. You can adjust the size,color,shape,add boarders and so much more! The pics are also stickers and are waterproof so you can put them anywhere 😍. The only downside is that the photo sheets come in packs of ten and I bought a combo for $50 of 30 and those where gone super fast! But hey I just tell my family to get me photo paper as a bday gift from now on 🤔🤗😉 I'm definitely not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be Returning this
customer_reviews.text: Although is printer isn’t horrible. I do not think it was worth the price listed. The film is even expensive for no reason. It’s very cheap film. The quality of the pictures is not good at all. Most would come out with white streaks and cartoonishly looking. I wanted something I could print pictures I already had so it does that just fine. But again, it’s very poor quality. The editing app doesn’t give u a lot of options either. The tools they have are dramatic to. All in all , this does what it says. But I’d price this around 40-50$ not the listed price.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Paper jam junk print
customer_reviews.text: I hardly leave reviews......Trust me when I say this, you better hope you don't get a paper jam or you'll be like the rest of us...sending it back. I had to take out 6 tiny screws to get to the roller and it was jammed so bad ill be returning it. I couldnt pull it out. Only way to get it out would be taking apart the roller components. My guess is the sticky paper backing came off and its literally stuck on the inside. Printed out a total of 13 before the jam. Bad design...id avoid because it will jam...just a matter of time and when it does you better hope its within your returning period.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Wisner

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality for Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to print pictures to add to my bullet journal. I was a bit hesitant to buy the printer after reading about the quality, but I'm glad I bought it anyways! The printer itself has a nice, sleek design, and the picture quality is decent enough for my purposes. Although the quality of the picture isn't great, I feel like it still does a decent job at getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Printer is Useless when the Required App doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I was able to print only 10 pictures before it stopped working. Read the reviews of the zip app before purchasing. The app attempts to send pictures to the printer, but stalls and is unable to complete the action. The photo quality is below average, but I wasn't expecting high quality photos. However, I was expecting the printer to work. I am tech-savvy and have tried troubleshooting the issue with no success. I wouldn't recommend spending $100+ for a product that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeelover

customer_reviews.title: Not the best color quality
customer_reviews.text: This printer doesn't meet the expectations I had when flipping through the provided images. It seems to have trouble with green and contrast. It only prints so dark, not black but more of a super dark brown. It's a good size and is fairly easy to use. If you are looking for super crisp and color accuracy don't get this. But if you just want to print some pictures for fun this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: On the Monsters of Rock cruise it was an absolute hit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute hit to be able to take a photo of a celebrity, print it out and then get it signed. Then you take a picture of your printer picture ftw! Several rockstars and celebs (here is looking at you Luc Karl) asked me for a copy. Also great for taking pictures of new friends and then writing contact info and names on the back so people can associate your face to the contact info. Battery life is long Bluetooth connects quickly Takes about 2-3 minutes to print a picture Fits in my Levi pants pocket Software is easy to install and has good functionality Only negative is that the sliding cover easily comes loose. Easily overcome with a rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: UberReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I love that it's about the same size as a phone and can be taken anywhere. It works great but the picture quality could be better. Not complaining though, it's perfect for what it is...I wasn't looking to frame a 2x3 photo...just wanted to have a quick print option from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Handy portable printer for small photos
customer_reviews.text: I used this printer to print out small photos for a commemorative scrap book. The print quality was very good - not perfect (hence 4 stars), but for the size and the platform, surprisingly sharp with good reproduction of colors. For a few photos, I did have to adjust the color balance so that the colors didn‘t look weird in the print. The software was very easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: California Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe I didn’t know about this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I’ve made in 2020! I cannot believe I didn’t know about this sooner! This printer was the best kept secret around!
customer_reviews.author: Book Reviews By Tara

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera ever. Dont do the firmware update
customer_reviews.text: Not the best camera out there. But the whole thing went to waste after the first firmware update. The first print after the update came out blank and the second try ended in paper getting jammed in it. And it just won't come out. The camera is not the best but gets the job done. I was living it for my purpose untill it got paper stuck and now is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: sherin

customer_reviews.title: The best mini-printer around
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have gotten it in a better color (The coral/pink looking one is extremely red) but overall I'm happy with this. I gave it to my girlfriend as a gift, and now her walls are coated in these little pictures. It's no inkjet printer quality, but it really does print good pictures and is very easy to use. Printing is relatively silent and only takes a few seconds. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I print small photos on a daily basis for journaling, planners, and arts/crafts projects. This printer is perfect! I love that the pictures have an adhesive back! A must-have for me! It's not only quick and easy, but also economical since I'm not paying for shipping fees, ink, expensive adhesives and/or create-a-sticker type supplies. The paper is all you buy, and it's priced well and saving me money. I take high quality photos and am very pleased with how nicely they print out. The printer and app are very easy to use, and printing is fast. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality photos especially considering it's around $1 per print! Cheaper to order from somewhere online for the same price or cheaper for better quality... But it was a gift for my daughter.. while she agrees it's not great it's still fun to have and a cool little "party trick" with her friends
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Rachel Ganus

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer as a gift for my girlfriend who loves to take and print pictures from her phone. She had always been going to Walmart to get her photos printed, so I figured I'd save her a trip and get her this instead. We have had a lot of fun using it together, and we especially love that the photos double as stickers! It's a little bit slow at printing, and sometimes there can be minor artifacts in the print, but overall the quality is great for casual use! I'd recommend this to anyone who enjoys taking and printing pictures to share with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Max C

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this portable printer for scrapbooking. The battery runs out fast and the photos are too dark. I’ve tried to play around with the edit settings but if I make them lighter I lose clarity in the photos. Nice for kids but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nitenurse77

customer_reviews.title: Okay item not great
customer_reviews.text: Error code alot have to lift printer up and slant it most of the time so roller inside grabs paper. Pictures come out abit dark hazy. Smaller photos then I thought it would be. Over all it's an ok item but not great.
customer_reviews.author: christine da cruz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality photos, and lot of fun borders and stickers that you can add to your photo if you like. I was nervous about some of the reviews complaining about quality image, but I am glad I got it anyway. Photos look great, image is clear, colors are vibrant. Awesome gift for my daughter, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and love how small it is
customer_reviews.text: In some pictures some of the colors are just a little off but great for the price and the fact that it prints in a matter of seconds and you can carry it with you everywhere you go! The refill sheets are just a little pricier but I think it's work it. It's cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: The best !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little printer !!! I use it for journaling / I write a diary and I love having a picture to go along with whatever I’m writing about. This diary will be an invaluable memory and treasure for me 30-40 years from now. Because memories fade but hand written story lines do not, you can always relive your life. I absolutely love this printer and quality is okay for the purpose !
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with Polaroid Zip.  Want to replace as it's defective
customer_reviews.text: Polaroid Zip stopped working at the end of July. It is paired correctly and previously printed. Evidently something in the unit itself has stopped working! Before you could hear it operating when printing...now fully charged unit is non functional!!! How do I get this defective unit replaced
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Levy

customer_reviews.title: ... is an extremely expensive product and it is absolutely terrible. The concept is amazing but the execution failed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely expensive product and it is absolutely terrible. The concept is amazing but the execution failed completely. I wish I would have really read the one star reviews when I was buying this product. Pros: connects easily, portable, small, quickly prints photos Cons: terrible terrible quality. I cannot say it enough. Do not buy this if you want your pictures to look anything like the original. I have tried everything to alter my photos to make them print with better quality and it's just not possible.
customer_reviews.author: JRayS1223

customer_reviews.title: Fun photo while stuck at home
customer_reviews.text: Once you download the app you’re able to punch the color otherwise the color is a little on the light side in original mode but easily corrected. Fun perfect distraction during these crazy times! I love the fact that you can print your regular photos from your phone to it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Darren B

customer_reviews.title: Prints dark
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer, but you do have to lighten the photos A LOT because they print very dark. I lighten them in the photos app and then I print. Sometimes I have to print a few to get it light enough where it looks good, but overall it's fun and convenient. They're fun to share and it's great fun watching the photo print. It's easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Junk. do not buy
customer_reviews.text: printed one picture then stopped working. contacted support----deleted app, reinstalled app, reset printer, turned phone on and off-- kept giving same error message. the one print it managed to print was worse than the quality of the old polaroid "instamatics.". Junk.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great idea but the pictures are too small, too dark and too grainy. Even after I cropped and lighted the images. The printer stops working all together every time I put new pack of papers in it too. It's just a bad product. Love the concept but it's not worth $99.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey and Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: My second Zip printer just broke after only six month so and minimal use. Shame on me for buying one of these twice. It says there is product support but that is not true. You get sent in circles and no one is willing to help nor are they willing to replace their junk. Seriously the pictures are bad and it will break before you get your money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea ! Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures print a little darker than the original, and not quite as detailed either. I had some success brightening the photos in my normal photo app , but it seems there's nothing to be done about the photo quality . Overall still a cool product , but just don't expect it to come out as vibrant as the digital version.
customer_reviews.author: Amorris

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! I used it twice...replaced paper and a piece of plastic literally fell off of the cover without me doing anything but taking the cover off to put more paper in. Now it won't snap back on so it's basically a worthless piece of plastic that I can't use anymore. I tried holding the piece down to see if it would give me a few more photos...nope. It is not made very well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Toulajit

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this printer...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against the vender which this was purchased from. It is the printer itself. Save yourself the time of being frustrated. The quality of color in the prints sucks. Also, the app you must use to print, it is the worse print app out there and the customer support just says "yes, we know it sucks but we are not fixing it." Save yourself the frustration and get the HP Sprocket. Same -ish price and the quality of printing it better. The app support is awesome, and it takes the same kind of paper that this one does...
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally wrote the review for this item for the case but I’ll try to write what I wrote there, the picture quality is clear but not crystal clear. It does come out a little darker than your original picture so you have to mess with the editing in the app and you’re good.
customer_reviews.author: bluee

customer_reviews.title: The app was easy to install and the process of editing and printing ...
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between this printer and the fuji one. After reading many reviews i settled on this one. The app was easy to install and the process of editing and printing pictures is very easy however tge quality really isnt great. I tried the fuji and the quality of the print is much better in my opinion. The paper is matte and the colors are not true. You can adjust the colors via the app but its still hit and miss. Overall its ok for what it is. Its nice to able to print pics quickly straight from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Zink Polaroid ZIP Wireless Mobile Photo Mini Printer (White) Compatible w/ iOS & Android, NFC & Bluetooth Devices
product_meta.description: Just took the perfect selfie? Pics or it did happen! Print your social media and camera memories instantly with the unique Polaroid ZIP Mobile Printer Simple one-touch operation makes it easier than ever for the whole family from kids to young adults to get in on the instant print action! Just connect to your smart phone or tablet via Bluetooth or NFC and watch your pictures come to life as pocket-sized photo prints that you can share What You Get 1 Polaroid ZIP Mobile Photo Printer Micro USB cable Polaroid ZINK Photo Paper (10-Pack) Specs & Details Dimensions 2 9ʺW x 4 7ʺL x 0 9ʺD (74 x 120 x 22 8 mm) Weight 6 6 oz (186 g) Micro USB Port Battery Rechargeable 500 mAh Lithium Polymer Charge Time 1 5 Hours Prints per charge 25 only Polaroid products offered by authorized dealers are covered by its manufacturer products from unauthorized re-sellers may be counterfeit damaged altered or previously used a list of authorized distributors is on the manufactures website.
feature_bullets: SMARTPHONE MEMORIES MADE REAL – Using the Polaroid ZIP is fast and easy. Just connect a smart phone or tablet via Wi-Fi and watch your portraits selfies and social media photos transform from digital images to physical pictures in an instant

STUNNINGLY VIBRANT PRINTS – ZINK ZERO INK printing technology eliminates the need for film ink toners cartridges and ribbons The premium 2x3ʺ sticky peel-back paper prints are not only colorful bold and lifelike but are also water-resistant tear-resistant smudge-proof and dry to the touch
FREE POLAROID MOBILE APP – Take your photography to the next level by downloading the FREE Polaroid app compatible with iOS and Android Print in less than 60 seconds

No computer connections needed– download the app and unlock all the customizable and adjustable editing features Polaroid has to offer From stickers to filters to borders photo editing is easy fun and as endless as your creativity

TRAVEL-READY DESIGN – The mini and pocket sized design is compact super portable and perfect for anyone who loves to travel blog do DIY projects or go on adventures The small size makes it easy to carry so you can share your favorite pictures whether you’re indoors outdoors at a party on vacation or at any other event

SHOP WITH CONFIDENCE - Only Polaroid products offered by authorized dealers are covered by its manufacturer’s Products from unauthorized re-sellers may be counterfeit damaged altered or previously used A list of authorized distributors is on the manufactures website

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,560 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
